contentrichtext.text: {{ infobox person | name = Jean-Marc de la Sablière | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1946|11|08|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Athens]], [[Greece]] | alma_mater = [[Sciences Po|Sciences Po Paris]], [[École nationale d'administration|ÉNA]] | occupation = Diplomat }} '''Jean-Marc de La Sablière''' (born 8 November 1946 in [[Athens]]) has been the Ambassador of [[France]] in [[Italy]] since 7 September 2007. Prior to this, he was the Permanent Representative of [[France]] to the [[United Nations]] from 2002 to 2007.<ref name=embassy>[http://www.ambafrance-it.org/spip.php?article1 Biographie de M. Jean-Marc de La Sablière]. La France en Italie, Ambassade de France à Rome. Accessed 21 January 2010.</ref> He arrived at the UN in 2002. For the previous two years he had been diplomatic adviser to [[President of France|President]] [[Jacques Chirac|Chirac]]. He is a former student of the [[École Nationale d'Administration]] (ÉNA). La Sablière also graduated from the [[Paris Institute of Political Studies]] ([[Sciences Po]]).<ref name=embassy/> ==Honors== *Officer of the [[Légion d'honneur]] *Chevalier of the [[Ordre national du Mérite]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =La Sabliere, Jean-Marc de | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = French diplomat | DATE OF BIRTH = 8 November 1946 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:La Sabliere, Jean-Marc de}} [[Category:1946 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Permanent Representatives of France to the United Nations]] [[Category:Sciences Po alumni]] [[Category:École nationale d'administration alumni]] [[Category:Presidents of the United Nations Security Council]] [[Category:Officiers of the Légion d'honneur]] [[Category:Chevaliers of the Ordre national du Mérite]] [[Category:Recipients of the Order of the Cross of Terra Mariana, 3rd Class]] {{France-bio-stub}}
